actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prescribe warnings respecting Reye's Syndrome for drugs containing aspirin.
short_title: Emergency Reye's Syndrome Prevention Act of 1985

summary.text: Emergency Reye's Syndrome Prevention Act of 1985 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require nontopical drugs containing aspirin to carry a label warning that such product should not be used by children or teenagers who have chicken pox, influenza, or flu symptons without consulting a doctor because of such product's possible association with the development of Reye's Syndrome.

titles.title: Emergency Reye's Syndrome Prevention Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prescribe warnings respecting Reye's Syndrome for drugs containing aspirin.
